summary: Wired existing DiffSummaryWidget into dashboard: added diff_summary to DashboardPanels, mounted in all view and dedicated diff view, registered view:diff in router/palette/slash commands, added widget visibility default, wrote 6 tests for parse_diff_stats and widget behavior
gotcha_discovered: Widget already existed from prior work, only needed wiring into dashboard views
pattern_that_worked: Followed existing widget pattern (RalphStatusWidget) for dataclass + render() method; tests needed DashboardPanels updates to include new field
